snippet.title: MythForce - Theme Song & Cartoon Intro!
snippet.description:
MythForce is a new original game from Beamdog! Inspired by 80s cartoons, MythForce unites swords & sorcery with gripping 1st-person combat in a roguelite adventure fit for Saturday mornings.

Listen on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/77zyliUJ8RQVJiYYYIwuO9?si=d5a6fcc23dec4a68&nd=1
Listen on Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/album/mythforce-feat-ruls-single/1617875280

Sign up on https://mythforce.com/ to get exclusive sneak-peeks!
Check it out on Epic Games & wishlist MythForce today! https://bit.ly/MythWishList 
Join our discord community: https://bit.ly/discordmyth

~MythForce Theme Lyrics~
You can try to take a swing at me
I’ll fight ya every inch of the way
That's the thing about destiny
I know that I’ll be winning today
Just tell me where the battle is
Oh I’m ready to jump back in

MythForce!
MythForce!
Everyday people become heroes
MythForce!
MythForce!
You and me, we can defeat evil

Fight together as one, 'cause
Might only get one shot
Give it everything you got!

MythForce!
MythForce! 
Everyday people become heroes!
